arts.ttl: Inter Milan Lead Juventus In Club Value Derby d’Italia: ‘Gap Set To Widen’
arts.sum: The club value of Inter Milan has overtaken that of Juventus, with the gap only “set to widen.” In figures released by Football Benchmark through the Gazzetta dello Sport, Inter’s entire club is valued at €1.715 billion; Juventus sit at €1.651 million. The organisation calculate the estimate through five parameters. Profitability, popularity, sporting potential, TV […] The post Inter Milan Lead Juventus In Club Value Derby d’Italia: ‘Gap Set To Widen’ appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.sum: Juventus and Inter Milan go head-to-head in the Derby d’Italia on Saturday. arts.ttl: Juventus vs. Inter: a Serie A thriller
arts.sum: In Serie A Enilive, the Derby d’Italia had not been played in September since 18 September 2016; on that occasion Inter came from behind to win 2–1 at San Siro (goals by Lichtsteiner, Icardi, and Perišić). Juventus–Inter is one of only two matches in the entire history of the single round-robin Serie A in which a player scored six goals in a single game: in the 1960/61 season, Juventus won 9–1 with six goals by Sivori.
LiveScore provides picks for all 10 weekend games as Inter face Juventus.
